title: Need Help With NA LCS Verified Fan Email
body: I reached out to the ticketing email as instructed and have yet to receive a response back. I'm told by my friends that an email was sent out as of the 3rd. Wondering what I can do about this. All email communicatoin has been through the same email

replies.body:
Hey AlienLlama,

We connected via email, but please reach back out if you have any issues!
